form.error: Please fill in the form content correctly
form.httpUrlIncorrect: Is not a valid HTTP address

settings.homePageUrlNote:
When you click the new tab page, it will automatically jump to the home page address. The primary address will be used first. If the link to the primary address is unavailable, the backup address will be used. 
When you have both intranet and public network addresses, it is recommended that the main address be filled in as the intranet address.
settings.openAPINote: To create the icon of the current page through Sun-Panel's OpenAPI, the Sun-Panel version is required to be in {version}
